title: [Large-Scale] Ontology-Based Learning Design and Object Integration Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science theories and comprehension of IMS-LD (learning design standard)
context.additional_context: Team-based project execution and summative assessment-centered operation in a smartphone-based, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Explain ontology-based mapping relationships between learning design elements and digital learning objects
Produce project deliverables designing learning object contexts using the LOCO-Cite ontology model
Develop reusable educational scenarios by integrating IMS-LD standards with learning object metadata
Evaluate the application of ontology frameworks to social phenomenon analysis projects through team-based PBL activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
